testcase.name: Bill Amount Generation
testcase.system-out: Given I placed an order for the following "Cucumber sandwich" with 2 and 40 "$".passed When I generate the bill....................................................passed Then a bill for $40 should be generated.....................................passed

testcase.name: Bill Amount Generation 2
testcase.system-out: Given I placed an order for the following "Carrot salad" with 3 and 30 "$"..passed When I generate the bill....................................................passed Then a bill for $40 should be generated.....................................passed
